name: Fallback to default font on OSError
description:
Scenario: Truetype font file is missing (OSError).
        Expectation: Fallback to ImageFont.load_default().

Scenario: Truetype font file is missing (OSError).
    Expectation: Fallback to ImageFont.load_default().
